sentences.en: A new mathematical analysis solves a longstanding cave-formation puzzle: how a trickle of water laced with carbonic acid manages to quickly dissolve rock to create massive conduits.
sentences.cn: 一个全新的数学分析方法解决了一个长期存在的洞穴形成难题：含有碳酸的一股细流如何快速溶解石头从而产生了大量的通道。

sentences.en: A rising carbonic acid level means a more acidic ocean.
sentences.cn: 上升的碳酸浓度使海水的酸度越来越高.

sentences.en: Carbonic acid can be made into dyes and disinfectants.
sentences.cn: 石炭酸可作染料、消毒剂等的原料.

sentences.en: Carbonic acid is formed when water absorbs carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 当水吸收二氧化碳时,即产生碳酸.

sentences.en: It consists of special resin, foaming agent fire - proofing agent, carbonic agent, pigment and filler.
sentences.cn: 由特殊树脂, 加上发泡剂 、 防火剂 、 成碳剂以及颜填料等组成.

sentences.en: It'suggested that one of the dehydrant mechanisms is inhibition of carbonic anhydrase activity.
sentences.cn: 表明抑制碳酸酐酶是速尿对内淋巴脱水的作用机理之一.

sentences.en: Manganese dioxide, carbonic acid manganese processing and sales.
sentences.cn: 二氧化锰, 碳酸锰加工销售.

sentences.en: Once in water, it reacts to form carbonic acid.
sentences.cn: 二氧化碳一旦进入水中, 就会发生反应形成碳酸.

sentences.en: Should the carbon dioxide mix with water underground and form carbonic acid, they say, it could leach poisonous materials from rock deep underground that could then seep out.
sentences.cn: 他们说，一旦二氧化碳与地下水融合极易形成碳酸，而这会把地下岩石中的有毒物质分解出来，从而污染我们的水资源。

sentences.en: The machine is applied to produce carbonic drinks, mix water, sugar and carbon dioxide together.
sentences.cn: 本机用于碳酸饮料的生产, 将水 、 糖浆、二氧化碳气体一次性混合.

sentences.en: The midpoint and equivalence point for carbonic acid are much higher.
sentences.cn: 碳酸滴定中点和等量点也高得多.

sentences.en: The ore was heated in the kilns to drive off water and carbonic acid gas.
sentences.cn: 矿石被放入窑里加热,蒸发掉水和碳酸气.

sentences.en: The present invention relates to a production method of milk beer and carbonic acid milk beverage.
sentences.cn: 一种奶啤酒及碳酸奶饮料的制造方法,属于奶饮料制做领域.

sentences.en: The research progress in the mimicking of carbonic an hydrase, hydrolase and redox enzyme is reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述了环糊精金属配合物用作模拟碳酸酐酶 、 水解酶、氧化还原酶的研究进展.

sentences.en: The species and preparation methods of carbonic system pantograph strip materials are explained in detail.
sentences.cn: 重点阐述了炭系受电弓滑板材料的种类和制备方法.

sentences.en: The type 1250 kneading complete set of equipment is used for kneading process of carbonic product.
sentences.cn: 1250型混捏成套设备用于碳素产品的混捏工序.

sentences.en: To remove carbon dioxide carbonic acid from.
sentences.cn: 人工加入二氧化碳的起泡饮料.

trans.tran_en: (of a compound) containing carbon, esp tetravalent carbon
